title: Come and meet RPA at agricultural shows and events this year

content.text: RPA will be attending many agricultural shows throughout 2025. This gives us the opportunity to have valuable face-to-face contact with a wide range of farmers, landowners and agents to discuss what’s important to you and get your insight and feedback.
So, if you’re there, come and talk to us. We’re keen to discuss any issues or queries, and we’re looking forward to meeting you and getting to know more about you and your farming business.
At some of the shows we’ll be sharing a stand with Defra Farming and Countryside Programme colleagues, offering a one stop shop for Defra.
You can view our 2025 programme below.

By following and subscribing to our social channels and blog, you’ll be able to see the latest updates about important information. We also share top tips and announcements. You can also listen to The RPA Podcast which we have launched to help farmers, landowners and rural communities keep up to date with the latest news from RPA.
